comments:
Build ID: 153

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a TestEAR project in workspace, delete it but leave contents on filesystem
2. Create a dynamic web project called Test and associate it with TestEAR
3. TestEAR is recreated, but if you look at the properties page, there are no facets on the project.

More information:
The following trace is in the console.

Created an attachment (id=62674)
Proposed fix

An additional check is added when creating EAR alongwith the project
I reviewed and approve this patch - additional check for EAR project location (making sure its valid)
Additional patch made after further testing required small change

+1
(having run into this myself in earlier versions :) )
